nodes.title: Add ability to name PushManager instances.
as of WWDC 2014 APNs is allowing max. 2048
Automatic delay for replacing failed connections to avoid servers throttling
Fixed NullPtrException on channelRegistered in ApnsConnection
Throw checked exception for odd token string lengths (fixes #88)
Adding option to add a Map of custom properties
Add ability give name to Pushmanager
Added @Override annotation to sample codes in README.md
Added @Override annotation to sample codes in README.md
Added @Override annotation in sample codes in README.md
Added timeout to all await calls in FeedbackServiceClient.
enabled method chaining in the builder object...
Use strong references instead of weak references for rejected notification listeners
Expose RejectedNotification tuple instead of RejectedNotificationReason
Expose RejectedNotification tuple instead of RejectedNotificationReason
Expose the size of the PushManager queue
Use a shared event loop group (fixes #13)
Reduce NIO event loop group size (fixes #9)
Added methods to poll the state of the `PushManager` and its client threads
add APNS-COLLAPSE-ID header to support notification management on iOS10
Ability to disable the auto-reconnect feature
Added the ability to disable the auto-reconnect feature
Drop fancy workaround for Travis CI hostname issue
Add notes on using Pushy in an application container
Update to Netty 4.1.4 and tcnative fork19
add apns-collapse-id header to support notification management on iOS10
add apns-collapse-id header to support notification management on iOS10
Treat upstream internal server errors as temporary failures (closes #336)
Mention that Pushy is also compatible with Safari push notifications
Mention that Pushy is also compatible with Safari push notifications
support subtitle and mutable-content for ios 10
support subtitle and mutable-content for ios 10
added the alpn-api dependency example for Maven users
Allow undefined behavior with multi-key P12 files (closes #292)
Adding new icon for maven central
Add OpenJDK 7 to the Travis build
set handshake failure exception in connectionReadyPromise
Added support for all kinds of netty ELGs.
Introducing jetty-alpn-agent for more clear pom file
Add metrics interfaces and members, to demo a way to offer metrics wihout tying down to a specific implementation
Fix passing not specified password for .p12 file
(fix) donot retry gracefully disconnect on IOException
(fix) check whether channel is writable before writeAndFlush
Add method getExpiredTokens which return Future with results
Fixes for #196 - Pushy continues enqueueing onto closed/poisoned conn…
Inject Executor instead of ExecutorService for listeners callbacks
(feat) Do not retry when connection rejected by a fatal reason.
Wait for last write listeners to finish before handling closure
Fix ApnsPayloadBuilder alert body check when title is included (fixes #168)
Encapsulate connection groups, add exponential back-off
Don't notify listeners of connection closure until all writes have finished
Add socks proxy support without breaking netty 4.0.x compatibility.
Make static inner classes of FeedbackServiceConnection
Format ExpiredToken token to readable string
Adding support for title and its localized version - new in iOS 8.2
Expose the number of writable connections
Optionally close connections after a set number of send attempts
Add tests for channel class utility methods
Drop netty-tcnative as a dependency under Java 8 and newer
Catch exceptions thrown before HTTP/2 connection handler is added to pipeline
Drop ALPN in favor of direct protocol negotiation
Use a non-zero default expiration time in SimpleApnsPushNotification
Process pending acquisition attempts when a connection attempt fails
Use shading to build the packages
Create an entirely separate benchmark server
Fix inconsistent feedback on connection exception, Issue #583
Add client and server support for `apns-id` headers
Don't treat internal server errors as write exceptions
Use an unresolved APNs hostname to improve GOAWAY handling
Add ability to specify 'apns-id' header value for a notification
[add]support retry mechanism when acquiring channel or sending notification fail
add DynamicInetProvider to get ip of gateway dynamiclly
Generate authorization headers as ASCII strings from tokens
Create new Auth Token before expiration of current Auth Token
Add support for HTTP/2 frame logging
Attach "connection ready" promise to channels at construction time
Print names of tests when running tests via Maven
Gracefully handle channel acquisition attempts after channel pools have closed
More details on sharing an ApnsClient
Use IntObjectMap to cut down on boxing/GC pressure
Add support for building MDM "wake up" payloads
Correct dependency versions from pushy-parent pom
Internalize reconnection mechanics and introduce connection pooling
Temporarily revert to the finalized (non-reference-counted) native SSL provider (fixes #478)
Verify headers in TLS mock server handler (fixes #483)
Drop the response promise map in favor of stream properties
Use Netty's stream management tools instead of rolling our own
Move channel closure logic from `close` to `channelInactive`
Added support for Netty's new KQueue transport (closes #467)
Move from relayrides to turo packages (closes #402)
Remove alpn-api from the README, too
Restore TLS authentication and move to a one-team-per-connection model
Use a separate mock server for benchmarks
Adding trace level log for accepted and rejected push notifications
Check for null before checking argument array length (fixes #428)
Possible concurrent modify on a plain HashMap
Cancel scheduled reconnect task during disconnecting ApnsClient
Move authentication token handling into the client handler
Move response promise handling into the client handler
Drop support for TLS-based client authentication (closes #398)
Use Maven's built-in dependency management mechanism
Allow callers to specify SSL providers
Add a backpressure mechanism for channel writes
Updated status codes for mock server
Add support for `subtitle` and `mutable-content` payload fields
Close idle connections instead of sending `PING` frames
Use a configuration class for APNs client parameters
Set automatic module names for all artifacts
Add support for relevance scores in payloads
Allow for literal and localized content in the same payload
Added support for iOS 15 interruption level
Make rejection reasons `Optional` instead of nullable
Include the HTTP status code in response objects
Possibility to use externally managed SSL context.
Explicitly close connections when we receive a GOAWAY
Fixed to remove re-import of exported packages
Clean up before calling `super` when channels become inactive
Fix #853: Reject inactive pending create channel
Add methods with fallback if loc-key not found to ApnsPayloadBuilder
Share authentication tokens between connections within a client
Drop Travis CI and switch to GitHub Actions
Initial GitHub Action workflow for testing pushy against various JDK versions
Log which channels are affected by token changes
Cancel ping futures when channels close
Add more logging around creating and closing channels
Add an easy path for trusting the GeoTrust root certificate
changed sh to bash in generate-certs.sh
Return the bound port on server startup
Update the Readme to reflect new getTokenInvalidationTimestamp usage
Make pool closure tests less time-based
Treat token expirations as fatal errors
Drop the generated JSON parser in favor of a hand-made parser
Add GSON/Jackson payload builders as sub-modules
Release reference-counted SSL contexts in a `finally` block
Check for null streams before attaching a "cause" property
Use timeouts instead of printing test names
Use lambdas and improved type inference
Document the HTTP system proxy shortcut in the top level README.md
Also get credentials for HTTP proxies from system properties
Drop `trace` calls that duplicate a frame logger's functionality
Proactively rotate authentication tokens before the server complains
Proposal: drop the notion of maximum payload lengths
Wrap payload bytes in an unpooled buffer
Prepare for change in project ownership
Fulfuill response promise when write notification failed
Add support for the `target-content-id` payload field
Only use OpenJDK when testing with Travis
added VoIP PushType for VoIP push notifications
close pending create channel futures when close apns channel pool
Implement factory methods to return HttpProxyHandlerFactory instances…

Turn the Pushy JAR file into an OSGi bundle
Represent the `critical` flag in payloads as a number

Stubbornly cling to frames in Javadoc after Java 11

Including ALPN supported protocols in Mock Server
Added `summary-arg` and `summary-arg-count` to the payload builder.
Update homepage URL to https, github.io
Always try to fill the channel pool before reusing idle connections
Log rejected causes when trying to mark promises as failed
Close resolver groups when closing clients/channel factories
